attributes.title: Hanging with Lil J
attributes.caption: Jeremy, Gavin, Trevor and Matt have a really good idea at lunch.
attributes.description: Jeremy, Gavin, Jack, Trevor and Matt have a really good idea at lunch. They have a free afternoon to hang around while the other Achievement Hunters are off playing Dungeons and Dragons. So what do they do? Check out this behind the scenes episode to see their masterpiece.

attributes.title: Michael's Segway Tour
attributes.caption: Whip out your segway and punch it, Michael's gonna teach you how to driiiiiiift!
attributes.description: Whip out your segway and punch it, Michael's gonna teach you how to driiiiiiift!

attributes.title: The Monster Mac
attributes.caption: Achievement Hunter builds a big-ass sandwich, fights about proper nug proportions.
attributes.description: McDonald's has done the unthinkable and added a couple new additions to the Big Mac family tree - baby boy Mac Jr and big daddy Grand Mac. Michael, Ryan, Jeremy, and Gavin think they haven't gone far enough. Masters of food science, Achievement Hunter has combined the Grand Mac, two Big Macs, four Mac Jrs, and a handful of nugs into the biggest, most badass Mac of them all - The Monster Mac.

attributes.title: The Slamrock Shake
attributes.caption: St. Patrick's Day is in need of some modern traditions, so Achievement Hunter is here to help!
attributes.description: St. Patrick's Day is in need of some modern traditions, so Achievement Hunter is here to help!

attributes.title: Loot Box Looters
attributes.caption: ​Sup guys. Matt Bragg here. So Overwatch has been out for about a year now. Cool game, right?
attributes.description: Sup guys. Matt Bragg here. So Overwatch has been out for about a year now. Cool game, right? You know what's not cool? Since the game came out, Larry has refused to open a single loot box. Yeah, I don't get why he is the way he is either. But hey, good day for me. The company decided to send Larry out of town for the Let's Play Live east coast tour. Now that he's gone, guess I've got some Loot Boxes to open.

attributes.title: Flinchless Kickie-Doo
attributes.caption: ​Gavin introduces a new game to Trevor, Jeremy, Jack, and Matt.
attributes.description: Gavin introduces a new game to Trevor, Jeremy, Jack, and Matt. Flinchless Kickie-Doo is a British neo-classic created by the one and only Gavin Free in 2017. It's been cherished by all the young British bloke for the past week or so. It's rumored that flinchless kickie-doo is soon to replace keepie-uppie as the premiere football feetie-footie game across the globe.

attributes.title: Keepie Uppie
attributes.caption: Unlike that super fake Flinchless Kickie-Doo, Gavin has brought an actual, real game from The England that actual, real footie kids actually, really play. I
attributes.description: Unlike that super fake Flinchless Kickie-Doo, Gavin has brought an actual, real game from The England that actual, real footie kids actually, really play. In Keepie Uppie, it's up to everyone to keep the ball (or Sock'em Bopper) up in the air. But this is Achievement Hunter's version of Keepie Uppie, and it wouldn't be Achievement Hunter's version unless they're trying to break everything in the office.

attributes.title: Flinchless Bouncy-Doo
attributes.caption: After Flinchless Kickie-Doo's stonking success, Gavin makes a new game using the office's pile of super bouncy balls, Flinchless Bouncy-Doo.
attributes.description: After Flinchless Kickie-Doo's stonking success, Gavin makes a new game using the office's pile of super bouncy balls, Flinchless Bouncy-Doo.

attributes.title: Smash Bowl
attributes.caption: Achievement Hunter throws a bowling ball at a trampoline. What else is there to say?
attributes.description: Achievement Hunter throws a bowling ball at a trampoline. What else is there to say?

attributes.title: Gavin's Fresh Breath
attributes.caption: Geoff wants to clean Gavin's mouth, but not in the normal, "boring" way.
attributes.description: Geoff wants to clean Gavin's mouth, but not in the normal, "boring" way.

attributes.title: Flappy Dack Stack
attributes.caption: We can't tell you what this video's about without being demonetized. ;D
attributes.description: We can't tell you what this video's about without being demonetized. ;D

attributes.title: Moon Ball
attributes.caption: Trevor brings a moon ball to the office and tells everyone to throw it around the light. Surely nothing will get broken this time.
attributes.description: Trevor brings a moon ball to the office and tells everyone to throw it around the light. Surely nothing will get broken this time.

attributes.title: Wall Mayo
attributes.caption: Gavin and Jeremy got all "worked up" and had to find a "release" for all their mayo.
attributes.description: Gavin and Jeremy got all "worked up" and had to find a "release" for all their mayo.

attributes.title: Pudding Shirt
attributes.caption: Achievement Hunter designs a new product for the RT Store. Introducing the Pudding Shirt. Trevor not included.
attributes.description: Get your very own pudding shirt in the Rooster Teeth Store.Achievement Hunter designs a new product for the RT Store. Introducing the Pudding Shirt. Trevor not included.

attributes.title: Bang Glove
attributes.caption: Achievement Hunter sets out to answer life's greatest mystery: Can a glove be shot across the room using the power of confetti cannons?
attributes.description: Achievement Hunter sets out to answer life's greatest mystery: Can a glove be shot across the room using the power of confetti cannons?

attributes.title: Flinchless Moony Doo
attributes.caption: Part 3 of the flinchless series is the most painful yet, as the guys throw moon balls and hit boy balls.
attributes.description: Part 3 of the flinchless series is the most painful yet, as the guys throw moon balls and hit boy balls.

attributes.title: High Intensity Snacking
attributes.caption: This new game is sweet. All you need is some baked goods and a baseball bat.
attributes.description: This new game is sweet. All you need is some baked goods and a baseball bat.
